tours.title: Coastal Paradise Weekend
tours.subtitle: 3 Days / 2 Nights
tours.description: Escape to stunning coastal destinations with pristine beaches, charming seaside towns, and breathtaking sunsets. Perfect for a relaxing weekend getaway.

tours.title: Mountain Adventure Escape
tours.subtitle: 4 Days / 3 Nights
tours.description: Experience the thrill of mountain adventures with hiking, camping, and breathtaking panoramic views. Ideal for nature enthusiasts and adventure seekers.

tours.title: City Explorer Weekend
tours.subtitle: 2 Days / 1 Night
tours.description: Discover vibrant cities, historic landmarks, and local culture. A perfect blend of sightseeing, dining, and entertainment for urban explorers.

tours.title: Desert Safari Experience
tours.subtitle: 3 Days / 2 Nights
tours.description: Embark on an unforgettable desert adventure with dune bashing, camel rides, stargazing, and traditional Bedouin experiences.

tours.title: Wine Country Retreat
tours.subtitle: 2 Days / 1 Night
tours.description: Indulge in a luxurious wine country experience with vineyard tours, wine tastings, gourmet dining, and scenic countryside views.

tours.title: Forest Wilderness
tours.subtitle: 3 Days / 2 Nights
tours.description: Connect with nature in pristine forests with hiking, bird watching, nature photography, and peaceful forest accommodations.

tours.title: Amazing Tour Experience 1
tours.subtitle: Weekend Getaway
tours.description: Discover breathtaking destinations and create unforgettable memories. This tour offers a perfect blend of adventure, culture, and relaxation for your weekend escape.

tours.title: Amazing Tour Experience 2
tours.subtitle: Weekend Getaway
tours.description: Discover breathtaking destinations and create unforgettable memories. This tour offers a perfect blend of adventure, culture, and relaxation for your weekend escape.
